name: Zany Zoo
description:
Have you always thought that taking care of animals in a beautiful zoo was something peaceful? Well, you are welcome to give it a try :)

Welcome to Zany Zoo

A small local zoo welcoming friends and families! You are the zoo keeper and it is your job to make sure everybody is happy… and safe :)

Take care of the animals, fill their needs using the tools in your shed (or… anything else?) and that’s it!

Controls:
  • Move with WASD/ZQSD
  • Jump with Space bar
  • Aim with the mouse
  • Grab (almost) anything holding mouse left button

Enjoy and have fun!
